SOURCE: The Abila Post
TITLE: ON THE SCENE BLOG
AUTHOR: Haneson Ngohebo
PUBLISHED: 21 January 2014
TEXT: 1013 UPDATE - CEO Sten Sanjorge, Jr. is not among the missing GAStech employees and is safe back in GAStech's Tethys headquarters in the capital Centrum. Names of the missing have still not been released.
